name: Calling with Santa
description:
HO…HO…HO! Merry Christmas! Let’s take a Video Call to Santa Claus

Calling with Santa is an entertainment app that amaze your children by requesting a free personalized video message or phone call from Santa Claus ! Calling with Santa has a special message for you whether they have been Naughty, or Nice. Santa can offer great words of encouragement! You will be blessed while listening to Santa Claus wishes.

The easiest way to make Christmas extra special this year !
Get a simulated video call from Santa Claus for free and tease your friends now!

Feature:
Video message from Calling with Santa: choose the Video Call on Santa games to call and have a live talk with Santa Claus.
Text message with Calling with Santa: Have a fun chit chat with Santa Claus
Mini games: Chill with fun games on Santa Call

How to use:
You can use this Calling with Santa app to have Santa call, speak to Santa & fool others with a realistic Santa Call Simulation. Receive a realistic call from Santa with options to accept or reject the call as if the real Santa is really calling you! Upon receiving the call from Santa you will hear HO…HO…HO!! with a MERRY CHRISTMAS!. You will have a wonderful time with this free Calling with Santa app.

Do you want to prank your friends and have fun with them like they are getting a call from Santa in real life?

Download Calling with Santa for free now! Santa Claus is waiting for you!
